title: Broken axe (adamant)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A broken adamant axe was an adamant axe that has been broken by an ent from a random event. It can be fixed at Bob's axe shop in Lumbridge for 107 coins.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Broken_hatchet_(adamant)
 Broken axe (adamant) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Broken axe

Item ID504

A broken adamant axe was an adamant axe that has been broken by an ent from a random event. It can be fixed at Bob's axe shop in Lumbridge for 107 coins.

If the broken axe was equipped before being broken, it will remain in the weapon slot. Once unequipped, it cannot be equipped again.

After an update on 11 September 2014 making random events optional, all existing broken axes were automatically repaired.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 – 16 October 2014

The item was graphically updated.

11 September 2014
(update)

The item's value was decreased from 43 to 1.

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.
